item.title: Making an animated ggplot
item.description: I decide to talk about how I make my awesome blog banner in this first post. üòÑ Why this banner ? It’s a french wordplay with my family name Sauder => Saut d’R (R jump in english). That’s why I decided to make a banner with the R-logo jumping on some (so cool) stickers. I choose stickers of packages that I use to do this animated ggplot. Which packages ? library(tidyverse) # install.
